meanings.definition: The thick-walled resting spore produced by certain rust fungi.
meanings.sent1: Teleutospores are like cozy little houses where rust fungi take a nap.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study teleutospores to understand how rust fungi reproduce.
meanings.sent3: The teleutospores decided to throw a party inside their thick walls.
meanings.sent4: The teleutospores lay dormant, waiting for the perfect conditions to awaken.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, teleutospores look like tiny fortresses protecting the rust fungi.

meanings.definition: A type of spore that is involved in the sexual reproduction of rust fungi.
meanings.sent1: Teleutospores play a crucial role in the love lives of rust fungi.
meanings.sent2: Farmers keep an eye out for teleutospores to prevent rust disease in crops.
meanings.sent3: The teleutospores blushed as they prepared for their romantic dance.
meanings.sent4: In the secret world of rust fungi, teleutospores are the matchmakers.
meanings.sent5: Each teleutospore carries the future of the rust fungi within its walls.
